effect_entries.short_effect: If the first PokeBall thrown fails to catch the pokemon, a pokemon with this ability will pick up the same type of ball at the end of the turn.
If a pokemon with this ability is attacked, all other pokemon on the field have their speed reduced by one stage.
When a pokemon with this ability enters battle the first time, their defense stat raises by one stage.
A pokemon with this ability gains a 1.5x boost to their attack, but can only select one move.

If a pokemon with this ability uses dive or surf, they gain a projectile which is launched at the opponent upon being damaged. This projectile does 25% damage and either reduces defense or paralyzes the opponent.
After each turn, a pokemon with this ability will change between full-belly and hangry formes.
If a pokemon with this ability is hit by a physical attack while ice face is active, they will take no damage and the ice face will break.
A pokemon with this ability takes half damage from special attackss.
When a pokemon with this ability enters battle the first time, their attack stat increases by one stage.
A pokemon with this ability changes type to match the first attack they're about to use.
A pokemon with this ability changes type to match whatever terrain is currently active on the field, if there is one.
If a pokemon with this ability were to have a stat lowered due to the effect of another pokemon, that decrease is reflected back at that pokemon.
When a pokemon with this ability enters battle, all other abilities are suppressed (except for Stance Change, Schooling, and Neutralizing Gas).
Heals and prevents user and all allies from poison.
If contact is made with a pokemon with this ability,  the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
A pokemon with this ability grants its allies a 1.3x damage boost.
A pokemon with this ability ignores moves and abilities that draw in or redirect attacks.
A pokemon with this ability has its sound-based attacks increased by 1.3x and takes half damage from sound-based attacks.
A pokemon with this ability has a 30% chance to move first in its priority bracket. Stacks with Quick Claw.
Doubles the effect of berries consumed.
When a pokemon with this ability is attacked and sandstorm is not active, sandstorm starts for 5 turns.
When a pokemon with this ability switches in to battle, all screens are removed from both sides of the field.
A pokemon with this ability ignores moves and abilites that draw in or redirect attacks.
If a pokemon with this ability is hit by a water or fire type move, their speed stat is maxed out.
Steel-type moves used by a Pokémon with this ability and its allies will receive a power boost of 50%.
Contact moves used by a pokemon with this ability ignore protect moves.
When a pokemon makes contact with a pokemon with this ability, their abilities are swapped and may reactivate.
Increases Electric-type moves by 1.5?x.
Increases Dragon-type moves by 1.5?x.
A Pokemon with this ability increases its Attack by 1 stage when it knocks out another Pokemon.
A Pokemon with this ability increases its Special Attack by 1 stage when it knocks out another Pokemon.
When a pokemon with this ability enters battle, it removes stat changes on all allies.
This ability gives Calyrex both Unnerve and Grim/Chilling Neigh.
The pokemon makes it rain for 5 turns when it enters battle.
Turns the sunlight harsh for 5 turns when the Pokemon enters a battle.
Ignores Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Substitute when attacking an opponent.
Accuracy cannot be reduced and opponent's evasion boosts are ignored.
Prevents Taunt, infatuation and Intimidate.
Protects from weather damage and powder moves.
When the pokemon enters battle, sandstorm is summoned for 5 turns.
When the pokemon enters battle, hail is summoned for 5 turns.
Normal-type moves become Flying-type and are boosted by 1.2x.
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and are boosted by 1.2x.
Normal-type moves become Ice-type and are boosted by 1.2x.
Every move used by the Pokemon will hit twice. The second move does 25% of the first.
Status moves have their priority increased by 1. These moves fail against opposing Dark-type pokemon.
Physical attacks to the pokemon lower its Defense stat by 1 stage but raise its Speed stat by 2 stages.
Flying type moves used by the pokemon are granted +1 priority when the pokemon is at full health.
Once per battle, the pokemon is protected from the first attack that hits it. 1/8 recoil damage is dealt instead.
Prevents flinching (except from Focus Punch) and blocks Intimidate.
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another by 1 stage every turn. Does not affect evasion or accuracy.
Prevents confusion and blocks Intimidate.
Intimidate, Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves raise the Pokemon's speed stat by 1 stage.
Allows the pokemon to hit Ghost-type pokemon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves, and blocks Intimidate.
When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
Opponents cannot use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
Lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself by 20%.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field, raising all its stats 2 stages.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored by 25% instead of taking damage.
The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, doubling the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
Immune to other Pokémon's status moves.
Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.
Status moves used have their priority reduced by 1, but cannot be impeded by the Ability of the target.
When an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon will boost the same stat for itself.
Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
Boosts the Pokémon's highest stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
Immune to status conditions and halves damage taken from Ghost-type moves.
Boosts the Pokémon's highest stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
Powers up Rock-type moves by 1.5x.
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
Powers up slicing moves by 1.5x.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted by 10% for each ally that has been defeated.
Lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself by 20%.
Reduces the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself by 20%.
Boosts Attack by 1 stage when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
Scatters poison spikes on the opposing side when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
Reduces the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself by 20%.
The Pokémon takes no damage from Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.
Doubles the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses when hit by a wind move or Tailwind.
Boosts the Pokémon's Attack 1 stage if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
A pokemon with this ability changes type to match the first attack they're about to use.
Raises atk, spatk, and speed for a turn after knocking out an opponent.
Summons a snowstorm when the Pokemon is sent into battle, raising the def of ice-type Pokemon.
